text: @CNN Bon Jovi's David Bryan Tests Positive for Coronavirus – https://t.co/jOpelSefmU Bon Jovi founding member and keyboardist David Bryan has tested Covid-19 positive- hydroxychloroquine “anti-malaria drug”— which he started two days later, Bryan reports that the medicine is working
